languages.text: {n}Эльдарский воин кивает на твой вопрос.{/n} "Нам тоже интересно узнать, сестра. Азуриан был милостив к тебе, как и наши предки из Контура бесконечности Алайтока. Скажи, каков был их ответ?"

{n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарский воин кивает на твой вопрос.{/n} "Нам тоже интересно узнать, сестра. Азуриан был милостив к тебе, как и наши предки из Контура бесконечности Алайтока. Скажи, каков был их ответ?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan had been merciful towards you, and so were our ancestors from the Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?:"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan had been merciful towards you, and so were our ancestors from the Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?:"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}听到你的提问，艾达灵族的战士也在一旁点了点头。{/n}“姐妹，这正是我们想问的。阿苏焉对你慈爱有加，正如我们来自阿莱托克永恒回路的先祖。告诉我们，他们是怎么回答你的？”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的提问，艾达灵族的战士也在一旁点了点头。{/n}“姐妹，这正是我们想问的。阿苏焉对你慈爱有加，正如我们来自阿莱托克永恒回路的先祖。告诉我们，他们是怎么回答你的？”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}La guerrera Aeldari responde asintiendo con la cabeza.{/n} «Nosotros también estamos ansiosos por saberlo, hermana. Asuryan ha tenido misericordia de ti, como también nuestros ancestros del Circuito Infinito de Alaitoc. Dinos, ¿cuál ha sido su respuesta?».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La guerrera Aeldari responde asintiendo con la cabeza.{/n} «Nosotros también estamos ansiosos por saberlo, hermana. Asuryan ha tenido misericordia de ti, como también nuestros ancestros del Circuito Infinito de Alaitoc. Dinos, ¿cuál ha sido su respuesta?».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Le guerrier aeldari approuve votre question d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Nous voudrions nous aussi entendre votre réponse, ma sœur. Asuryan a fait preuve de clémence envers vous, comme nos ancêtres du Circuit d'Infinité d'Alaitoc. Dites-nous : quelle a été leur réponse ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le guerrier aeldari approuve votre question d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Nous voudrions nous aussi entendre votre réponse, ma sœur. Asuryan a fait preuve de clémence envers vous, comme nos ancêtres du Circuit d'Infinité d'Alaitoc. Dites-nous : quelle a été leur réponse ? »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Der Aeldari-Krieger nickt bei deiner Frage.{/n} "Das möchten wir auch wissen, Schwester. Asuryan hat Euch Gnade erwiesen, genau wie unsere Ahnen von Alaitocs Unendlichkeitsmatrix. Sagt uns: Wie lautete ihre Antwort?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari-Krieger nickt bei deiner Frage.{/n} "Das möchten wir auch wissen, Schwester. Asuryan hat Euch Gnade erwiesen, genau wie unsere Ahnen von Alaitocs Unendlichkeitsmatrix. Sagt uns: Wie lautete ihre Antwort?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}アエルダリの戦士はあなたの質問に対して頷く。{/n}「我々も知りたいのだ。アシュリアンはお前に対し、慈悲深かった。アレイトックの無限回路から来た我々の父祖もそうだった。教えてほしい…彼らの答えを」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリの戦士はあなたの質問に対して頷く。{/n}「我々も知りたいのだ。アシュリアンはお前に対し、慈悲深かった。アレイトックの無限回路から来た我々の父祖もそうだった。教えてほしい…彼らの答えを」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Aeldari savaşçısı, başını sallayarak soruna cevap veriyor.{/n} "Biz de bu sorunun cevabını merak ediyoruz kardeşim. Asuryan, Alaitoc Ebedî Devresi'ndeki atalarımız gibi sana merhamet gösterdi. Söyle bize, ne cevap verdi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari warrior nods at your question.{/n} "We are eager to know as well, sister. Asuryan was merciful toward you, as were our ancestors from Alaitoc's Infinity Circuit. Tell us — what was their answer?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari savaşçısı soruna başını sallayarak cevap veriyor.{/n} "Biz de bu sorunun cevabını merak ediyoruz kardeşim. Asuryan, Alaitoc Ebedî Devre'deki atalarımız gibi sana merhamet gösterdi. Söyle bize, cevapları neydi?"
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
